abstract member SetProgress : int * bool -> unit override this.SetProgress : int * bool -> unit

Docs.param: the new progress value, between #getMin() and #getMax()
true to animate between the current and target values or false to not animate
Docs.summary: Sets the current progress to the specified value, optionally animating the visual position between the current and target values.
